nodes.text: The Venomator was a highly advanced starfighter designed by the Geonosian engineer known as Bogg.

The Venomator was equipped with state-of-the-art defensive, offensive and subterfuge weapon systems. It featured laser cannons that could shoot in all directions, missile launchers, as well as a heavy laser cannon sticking out from the rest of the ship.

The Venomator was last surviving creation of the infamous Geonosian engineer Bogg. Some time after his incarceration, the Venomator was owned by outlaw tech Clawfish, who planned to sell it to the highest bidder in his black market operation on Callos.

In around 20 BBY, Jedi Master Kit Fisto and Padawan Ahsoka Tano went on a mission to Callos to prevent the Venomator from falling into the wrong hands. However, the illegal auction was interrupted by T'orn Zorc and his soldiers who claimed the craft. The theft of the ship would have earned Zorc serious support, as he was planning on making a power play for control of the Black Sun. The Falleen's efforts were eventually foiled by Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress, who killed Zorc and destroyed the Venomator with her lightsabers, since he was deemed too unpredictable to be allowed to rule.
